commit message:
Fix accessibility service in Android 4.1.

Ignore gen directory.

Add shake-to-silence.

Dissolve setServiceInfo method.
Remove unused string: loading
Don't ignore .gitignore.

Add notification log viewer.

Merge AppListAdapter into AppList.

Add TTS Repeat option.

Fix crash when NotifyList.listener is null in addNotification.
Fix ignored strings not working when containing caps.

Add Italian translation by Teorouge (Matteo Regoli).

Add info logging for shake-to-silence.
Update version in manifest.
